name: Harbin Wester

personality.speech: Bluster and excuses. 'Not all that much trouble, really.'
personality.mannerisms: Sweats when nervous, avoids eye contact with strong personalities

role: Elected townmaster. Supposed to judge disputes and keep records. Completely intimidated by Redbrands.
quest: 100 gp to deal with ore band near Wyvern Tor (east on Triboar Trail)
jail: Small serviceable jail in cellar (2 cells). Harbin has keys.
weakness: Won't keep Redbrand prisoners unless whole gang defeated. Can be persuaded/intimidated.
development: After Redbrands eliminated, more willing to assert authority
